job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Description:<br><p>SEMCON provides a highly qualified, professional, and responsive technical and managerial workforce to satisfy customer requirements that support the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA)&apos;s mission, vision, goals. SEMCON's company culture aligns enriching career experiences, growth opportunities, and collaborative engagement for all SEMCON employees resulting in a company value being greater than the sum of our parts.<br><br></p><p><br><br><br></p><p> <br><br></p><p><strong>Want to be part of our team?<br><br></strong></p><p><br><br><br></p><p>We are searching for a <strong>Software Engineer</strong> to join our NJ team in Egg Harbor Township supporting software design, development, maintenance, testing and interface of software with computer hardware systems. Experience in RedHat/CentOS or similar Linux Operating Systems is required.<br><br></p><p><br><br><br></p><p><em>The Software Engineer will have the knowledge, skills, abilities and/or Technical experience (either professional or educational) in all or some of the following areas:<br><br></em></p><ul><li>Languages: C/C++, Java, or similar object-oriented language</li><li>Platforms: ActiveMQ , SOA, JMS</li><li>Operating Systems: Windows, Linux</li><li>Software: Familiarity with modern repositories such as Subversion or Git, and experience working with XML</li><li>Adaptability in a software environment</li><li>SQL or other databases is a plus</li><li>VMWare/Citrix virtual environments or equivalent is a plus</li><li>Experience in FAA/NAS Systems is a plus.</li></ul><p><br><br><br></p><p>Documentation skills, and excellent verbal and written communication skills are required.<br><br></p><p><br><br><br></p><p>Bachelor&apos;s Degree in Engineering, Math, Computer Science, or other related discipline, and 3-5 years of experience and the ability to obtain a Security Clearance is required. <br><br></p><p><br><br><br></p><p>This position may require some travel (approx. 10-15-%). <br><br></p><p><br><br><br></p><p>SEMCON offers a competitive salary and complete benefits package which includes health benefits (medical, dental, vision and life), 401K with a generous employer match, paid time off and paid holidays <br><br></p><p><br><br><br></p>.<br><br>Requirements:
